spirit:field.spirit:name: Id
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR registers ASCII identification field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CvsMinor
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR registers CVS minor revision field. This field relates to the post-decimal CVS version number, as seen in the format: MAJOR.MINOR

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: XRR registers CVS minor revision field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CvsMajor
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR registers CVS major revision field. This field relates to the pre-decimal CVS version number, as seen in the format: MAJOR.MINOR

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: XRR registers CVS major revision field.

spirit:register.spirit:name: IntEn
spirit:register.spirit:description:
Interrupt enable register.
0 = interrupt disabled. 1 = interrupt enabled.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexDevResp
spirit:field.spirit:description: Device response interrupt enable field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrAsync
spirit:field.spirit:description: Downstream Async Frame header read interrupt enable field.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Async Frame header read interrupt enable field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrPer
spirit:field.spirit:description: Downstream Periodic Frame header read interrupt enable field.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Periodic Frame header read interrupt enable field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrMSA
spirit:field.spirit:description: REX mass storage acceleration (MSA) event interrupt enable field.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Accelerated Frame header read interrupt enable field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexSOF
spirit:field.spirit:description: REX start of frame (SOF) event interrupt enable field.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: REX start of frame (SOF) event interrupt enable field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntInOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR.StatCntIn.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt enable field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntOutOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR.StatCntOut.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt enable field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntFlcOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR.StatCntFlc.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt enable field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntErrOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR.StatCntErr.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt enable field.

spirit:register.spirit:name: IntFlg
spirit:register.spirit:description:
Interrupt flag register.
0 = no interrupt event detected 1 = interrupt event detected
Note: if the corresponding interrupt enable field (XRR.IntEn.xxx) is asserted and the corresponding interrupt source field (XRR.IntSrc.xxx) is asserted the interrupt flag will assert. Unless otherwise stated.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexDevResp
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Device response interrupt flag field.
LEVEL SENSITIVE INTERRUPT: This field is set when the corresponding interrupt source field and the corresponding interrupt enable field are set. This field is cleared by writing the corresponding interrupt clear field '1' while the interrupt source field is '0'.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrAsync
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Frame header read interrupt flag field.
LEVEL SENSITIVE INTERRUPT: This field is set when the corresponding interrupt source field and the corresponding interrupt enable field are set. This field is cleared by writing the corresponding interrupt clear field '1' while the interrupt source field is '0'.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Async Frame header read interrupt flag field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrPer
spirit:field.spirit:description:
REX mass storage acceleration (MSA) event interrupt flag field.
LEVEL SENSITIVE INTERRUPT: This field is set when the corresponding interrupt source field and the corresponding interrupt enable field are set. This field is cleared by writing the corresponding interrupt clear field '1' while the interrupt source field is '0'.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Periodic Frame header read interrupt flag field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrMSA
spirit:field.spirit:description:
REX start of frame (SOF) event interrupt flag field.
LEVEL SENSITIVE INTERRUPT: This field is set when the corresponding interrupt source field and the corresponding interrupt enable field are set. This field is cleared by writing the corresponding interrupt clear field '1' while the interrupt source field is '0'.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: REX mass storage acceleration (MSA) event interrupt flag field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexSOF
spirit:field.spirit:description: LEVEL SENSITIVE INTERRUPT: This field is set when the corresponding interrupt source field and the corresponding interrupt enable field are set. This field is cleared by writing the corresponding interrupt clear field '1' while the interrupt source field is '0'.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: REX start of frame (SOF) event interrupt flag field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntInOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
XRR.StatCntIn.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt flag field.
POSEDGE INTERRUPT: This field is set on the rising edge of the corresponding interrupt source field when the corresponding interrupt enable field is set. This field is cleared by writing the corresponding interrupt clear field '1'.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntOutOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
XRR.StatCntOut.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt flag field.
POSEDGE INTERRUPT: This field is set on the rising edge of the corresponding interrupt source field when the corresponding interrupt enable field is set. This field is cleared by writing the corresponding interrupt clear field '1'.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntFlcOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
XRR.StatCntFlc.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt flag field.
POSEDGE INTERRUPT: This field is set on the rising edge of the corresponding interrupt source field when the corresponding interrupt enable field is set. This field is cleared by writing the corresponding interrupt clear field '1'.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntErrOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
XRR.StatCntErr.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt flag field.
POSEDGE INTERRUPT: This field is set on the rising edge of the corresponding interrupt source field when the corresponding interrupt enable field is set. This field is cleared by writing the corresponding interrupt clear field '1'.

spirit:register.spirit:name: IntSrc
spirit:register.spirit:description:
Interrupt source register.
0 = interrupt source inactive. 1 = interrupt source active.
Note: These fields reflect the live interrupt source status and may not be valuable as polled fields.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexDevResp
spirit:field.spirit:description: Device response interrupt source field. Triggered when a device response is placed in the DevResp Queue

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrAsync
spirit:field.spirit:description: REX frame header read interrupt source field.. This field is asserted for a single cycle when the LexCtrlRespRexSch queue receives a packet. This interrupt source applies to only REX implementations.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Async frame header interrupt source field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrPer
spirit:field.spirit:description: Downstream Periodic frame header interrupt source field.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Periodic frame header interrupt source field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrMSA
spirit:field.spirit:description: REX start of frame (SOF) event interrupt source field.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Accelerated frame header interrupt source field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexSOF
spirit:field.spirit:description: REX start of frame (SOF) event interrupt source field.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: REX start of frame (SOF) event interrupt source field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntInOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR.StatCntIn.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt source field. This field indicates that one or more of the overflow(s) in the XRR.StatCntIn register is = 1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntOutOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR.StatCntOut.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt source field. This field indicates that one or more of the overflow(s) in the XRR.StatCntOut register is = 1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntFlcOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR.StatCntFlc.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt source field. This field indicates that one or more of the overflow(s) in the XRR.StatCntFlc register is = 1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntErrOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: XRR.StatCntErr.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt source field. This field indicates that one or more of the overflow(s) in the XRR.StatCntErr register is = 1.

spirit:register.spirit:name: IntClr
spirit:register.spirit:description:
Interrupt clear register. Writing '1' to a field within this register will clear the corresponding interrupt flag field in the XRR.IntFlg register.
Note: All fields within this register are self clearing.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexDevResp
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Device response interrupt clear field.
Note: Write '1' to this field to clear the corresponding interrupt flag. This field is self-clearing.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrAsync
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Frame header read interrupt clear field.
Note: Write '1' to this field to clear the corresponding interrupt flag. This field is self-clearing.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Async Frame header interrupt clear field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrPer
spirit:field.spirit:description:
REX mass storage acceleration (MSA) event interrupt clear field.
Note: Write '1' to this field to clear the corresponding interrupt flag. This field is self-clearing.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Periodic Frame header interrupt clear field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexRdFrmHdrMSA
spirit:field.spirit:description:
REX start of frame (SOF) event interrupt clear field.
Note: Write '1' to this field to clear the corresponding interrupt flag. This field is self-clearing.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Downstream Accelerated Frame header interrupt clear field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq0RexSOF
spirit:field.spirit:description: Note: Write '1' to this field to clear the corresponding interrupt flag. This field is self-clearing.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: REX start of frame (SOF) event interrupt clear field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntInOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
XRR.StatCntIn.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt clear field.
Note: Write '1' to this field to clear the corresponding interrupt flag. This field is self-clearing.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntOutOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
XRR.StatCntOut.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt clear field.
Note: Write '1' to this field to clear the corresponding interrupt flag. This field is self-clearing.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntFlcOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
XRR.StatCntFlc.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt clear field.
Note: Write '1' to this field to clear the corresponding interrupt flag. This field is self-clearing.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Irq1StatCntErrOverflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
XRR.StatCntErr.XXXOvfl(s)=1 interrupt clear field.
Note: Write '1' to this field to clear the corresponding interrupt flag. This field is self-clearing.

spirit:register.spirit:name: StatCntIn
spirit:register.spirit:description:
IN transaction statistics counter register.
Note: all fields within this register are cleared upon read of this register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Bulk
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bulk IN counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Bulk IN transaction has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BulkOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Bulk IN transaction counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntIn.Bulk counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntIn.Bulk counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Bulk IN transaction counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Iso
spirit:field.spirit:description: Isochronous IN counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Isochronous IN transaction has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IsoOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Isochronous IN transaction counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntIn.Iso counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntIn.Iso counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Isochronous IN transaction counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Intrp
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt IN counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Interrupt IN transaction has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IntrpOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Interrupt IN transaction counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntIn.Intrp counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntIn.Intrp counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Interrupt IN transaction counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Ctrl
spirit:field.spirit:description: Control IN counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Control IN transaction has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CtrlOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Control IN transaction counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntIn.Ctrl counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntIn.Ctrl counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Control IN transaction counter overflow field.

spirit:register.spirit:name: StatCntOut
spirit:register.spirit:description:
OUT transaction statistics counter register.
Note: all fields within this register are cleared upon read of this register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Bulk
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bulk OUT counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Bulk OUT transaction has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BulkOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Bulk OUT transaction counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntOut.Bulk counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntOut.Bulk counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Bulk OUT transaction counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Iso
spirit:field.spirit:description: Isochronous OUT counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Isochronous OUT transaction has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IsoOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Isochronous OUT transaction counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntOut.Iso counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntOut.Iso counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Isochronous OUT transaction counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Intrp
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt OUT counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Interrupt OUT transaction has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IntrpOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Interrupt OUT transaction counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntOut.Intrp counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntOut.Intrp counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Interrupt OUT transaction counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Ctrl
spirit:field.spirit:description: Control OUT counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Control OUT transaction has completed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CtrlOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Control OUT transaction counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntOut.Ctrl counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntOut.Ctrl counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Control OUT transaction counter overflow field.

spirit:register.spirit:name: StatCntFlc
spirit:register.spirit:description:
IN/OUT transaction flow control statistics counter register.
Note: all fields within this register are cleared upon read of this register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BulkIn
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bulk IN transaction flow control counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Bulk IN transaction has been dropped due to flow control conditions.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Bulk IN transaction flow control counter field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BulkInOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Bulk IN transaction flow control counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntFlc.BulkIn counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntFlc.BulkIn counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Bulk IN transaction flow control counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IsoIn
spirit:field.spirit:description: Isochronous IN transaction flow control counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Isochronous IN transaction has been dropped due to flow control conditions.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Isochronous IN transaction flow control counter field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IsoInOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Isochronous IN transaction flow control counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntFlc.IsoIn counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntFlc.IsoIn counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Isochronous IN transaction flow control counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BulkOut
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bulk OUT transaction flow control counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Bulk OUT transaction has been dropped due to flow control conditions.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Bulk OUT transaction flow control counter field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BulkOutOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Bulk OUT transaction flow control counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntFlc.BulkOut counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntFlc.BulkOut counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Bulk OUT transaction flow control counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IsoOut
spirit:field.spirit:description: Isochronous OUT transaction flow control counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Isochronous OUT transaction has been dropped due to flow control conditions.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Isochronous OUT transaction flow control counter field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IsoOutOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Isochronous OUT transaction flow control counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntFlc.IsoOut counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntFlc.IsoOut counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Isochronous OUT transaction flow control counter overflow field.
IN/OUT transaction flow control statistics counter register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: StatCntErr
spirit:register.spirit:description:
Error statistics counter register.
Note: all fields within this register are cleared upon read of this register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Link
spirit:field.spirit:description: Link error counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a Link error has occurred.

spirit:field.spirit:name: LinkOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Link error counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Link counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Link counter has overflowed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Crc16
spirit:field.spirit:description: CRC16 error counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a CRC16 error has occurred.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Crc16Ovfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
CRC16 error counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Crc16 counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Crc16 counter has overflowed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Crc5
spirit:field.spirit:description: CRC5 error counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a CRC5 error has occurred.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Crc5Ovfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
CRC5 error counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Crc5 counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Crc5 counter has overflowed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Pid
spirit:field.spirit:description: PID error counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a PID error has occurred.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PidOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
PID error counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Pid counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Pid counter has overflowed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BitStuff
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bit stuff error counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a bit stuff error has occurred.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BitStuffOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Bit stuff error counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntErr.BitStuff counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntErr.BitStuff counter has overflowed.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Bit stuff error counter overflow field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Babel
spirit:field.spirit:description: Babel error counter field. This field is incremented every time it has been determined that a babel error has occurred.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BabelOvfl
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Babel error counter overflow field.
0 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Babel counter has not overflowed. 1 = XUSB.StatCntErr.Babel counter has overflowed.

spirit:register.spirit:name: RexCtrl
spirit:register.spirit:description:
REX control register.
Note: fields in this register apply only to REX configurations.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SofEn
spirit:field.spirit:description: SOF synchronization and generation enable field. 0 = do not generate SOFs. 1 = generate SOFs based on the setting in the SOFAvgMode field

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: SOF synchronization and generation enable field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SchEn
spirit:field.spirit:description: REX scheduler enable field. 0 = REX scheduler is disabled. 1 = REX will schedule packets in the Scheduled queue to either the uFrame or ISOC frame queues.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TxEn
spirit:field.spirit:description: REX transmit enable field. 0 = REX will not transmit anything 1 = REX will transmit packets in the SOF, Async, uFrame, and ISOC frame queues.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SOFAvgMode
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 = Average mode. SOF is synchronized to the received SOF 1 = Fixed mode. SOF is generated base on the SOFMinTime rate and is not synchronized to the received SOF In Average mode Rex waits for the first downstream before it starts generating the SOF's to the device. In Fixed mode Rex will generate its own SOF once this field, TxEn, and SofEn are set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DbgTxState
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the current state of the xrex tx ctrl which deals with the sending and receiving of packets to/from the device. State 0 : Check Cache : Wait for a packet to be written to the cache and then send to the device 1 : Wait for read header : Wait for the frame header from the cache to be read 2 : Wait Start Tx : If we are going to send an Out or Setup then wait for the data packet to be written to the data queue before sending the packet 3 : Get Retry Q : Get a Queue to save a data packet to for retrying 4 : Start Tx : Send the packet for the frame header read from the cache to the device 5 : Retry : Retry the last packet sent 6 : Wait for tx complete : Wait until the packet has been sent to the device 7 : Wait for response : Wait for an errored response or the pid of the response from the device 8 : Wait for end of response : Wait for the end of the response 9 : Wait for send ack to device complete : Wait for the ack to be sent to the device 10 : Wait for Sof : (default) Wait for Sof from Xcrm 11 : Tx Sof : Wait until SOF has been sent 12 : Dump Pkt : For flow control dump the In packets to be sent to the device 13 : Wait for timeout : Wait for a timeout from the device 14 : Send Upstream : send an upstream packet 15 : Wait Xurm Done : Wait for the xurm to finish receiving the packet

spirit:field.spirit:name: SofAvgCnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: This sets when the SOF should be adjusted based on the frame count. A value of 1 means that every frame the SOF is adjusted. A value of 2 means the SOF is adjusted every second frame.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Msa_Retry_Disable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Setting this bit will disable the retrying of MSA packets in hardware and will send all responses back to the cpu

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Setting this bit will disable the retrying of MSA packets in hardware and will send all responses back to the cpu

spirit:field.spirit:name: CurUFrame
spirit:field.spirit:description:
REX current microframe status field. This represents the current microframe on REX.
Bit [3] = current microframe. Bits [2:0] = LSB of current frame.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FrameTime
spirit:field.spirit:description: Frame time field (in system clocks). This field is driven by a down counter that tracks the remaining time in the frame/microframe.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RxCurUFrame
spirit:field.spirit:description: Received microframe count field. This field represents the microframe/frame that was received at REX.

spirit:register.spirit:name: RdFrmHdr0
spirit:register.spirit:description: Frame header read from the scheduled queue status register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Addr
spirit:field.spirit:description: Cache read address field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Endp
spirit:field.spirit:description: Cache read endpoint field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: EndpType
spirit:field.spirit:description: Endpoint Type 0 = Ctrl 1 = Isoc 2 = Bulk 3 = Int

spirit:field.spirit:name: Action
spirit:field.spirit:description: Action 0 = In 1 = Out 2 = Setup 3 = Ping

spirit:field.spirit:name: Modifier
spirit:field.spirit:description: Modifier 0 = Null 1 = Pre 2 = SSplit 3 = CSplit

spirit:field.spirit:name: DataQid
spirit:field.spirit:description: Data Qid where a data packet for an Out or Setup is stored

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Data Qid where a data packet for an Out or Setup is stored

spirit:field.spirit:name: Toggle
spirit:field.spirit:description: Setup Toggle

spirit:field.spirit:name: SchType
spirit:field.spirit:description: Schedule type of the packet that was last sent to the device. Only valid for DevResp packets

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Schedule type of the packet that was last sent to the device. Only valid for DevResp packets

spirit:field.spirit:name: Response
spirit:field.spirit:description: Response ID 0 = Null 1 = Ack 2 = Nak 3 = Stall 4 = Nyet 5 = Err 6 = Timeout 7 = 3k (unused) 8 = Data0 9 = Data1 A = Data2 B = MData

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Frame header read from the scheduled queue status register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: RdFrmHdr1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Extended frame header read from the scheduled queue status register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: HubPort
spirit:field.spirit:description: Split Hub port

spirit:field.spirit:name: HubAddr
spirit:field.spirit:description: Split Hub address

spirit:field.spirit:name: SplitSE
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Isoc Out Start = 2 Middle = 0 End = 1 All = 3
Other LS = 2 FS = 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: Error
spirit:field.spirit:description: USB Error Set if Transmited packet or received packet was errored

spirit:field.spirit:name: RxUFrame
spirit:field.spirit:description: Microframe in which packet was received field.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Receive microframe in which packet was received field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RxFrame
spirit:field.spirit:description: Frame in which packet was received field.

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: Extended frame header read from the scheduled queue status register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Accel
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 = Not Accelerated 1 = CBW 2 = Data

spirit:field.spirit:name: Count
spirit:field.spirit:description: Used for retry count and nyet count. Count is set by scheduler and returned back in devresp

spirit:field.spirit:name: CBWDir
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the CBW Direction bit in the Mass Storage CBW packet

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This is the CBW Direction bit in the Mass Storage CBW packet

spirit:field.spirit:name: Split
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the time in system clocks before the EOF after which a HS Split packet will not be sent

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This is the time in system clocks before the EOF after which a HS Split packet will not be sent

spirit:field.spirit:name: Isoc
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the time in system clocks before the EOF after which a HS Isoc packet will not be sent

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This is the time in system clocks before the EOF after which a HS Isoc packet will not be sent

spirit:register.spirit:name: HSEofTime1
spirit:register.spirit:description: ASYNC packet frame/microframe cutoff configuration register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Async
spirit:field.spirit:description:
ASYNC packet cutoff configuration field. This field defines the number of system clocks pre-EOF where no more ASYNC packets will be sent in the current frame/microframe.
Note: the default time is based on the largest packet (Interrupt IN DATA ACK).

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: ASYNC packet frame/microframe cutoff configuration register.
ASYNC packet frame/microframe cutoff configuration register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: FSEofTime
spirit:register.spirit:description: Full speed isochronous frame cutoff configuration register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Async
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the time in system clocks before the EOF after which a FS Async packet will not be sent

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This is the time in system clocks before the EOF after which a FS Async packet will not be sent

spirit:field.spirit:name: Isoc
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the time in system clocks before the EOF after which a FS Isoc packet will not be sent

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This is the time in system clocks before the EOF after which a FS Isoc packet will not be sent
Full speed isochronous frame cutoff configuration register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Addr
spirit:field.spirit:description: The USB Address to send

spirit:field.spirit:name: Endp
spirit:field.spirit:description: The USB Endpoint to send

spirit:field.spirit:name: EndpType
spirit:field.spirit:description: The USB Endpoint Type to send

spirit:field.spirit:name: Action
spirit:field.spirit:description: The Action to send

spirit:field.spirit:name: Modifier
spirit:field.spirit:description: The Modifier to send

spirit:field.spirit:name: DataQid
spirit:field.spirit:description: The Data Qid where the data packet is stored for an Out or Setup packet

spirit:field.spirit:name: Toggle
spirit:field.spirit:description: The Setup Toggle bit

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This the frame header to be written to the cache

spirit:field.spirit:name: HubPort
spirit:field.spirit:description: The USB Hub Port to send

spirit:field.spirit:name: HubAddr
spirit:field.spirit:description: The USB Hub Address to send

spirit:field.spirit:name: SplitSE
spirit:field.spirit:description:
Isoc Out Start = 2 Middle = 0 End = 1 All = 3
Other LS = 2 FS = 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: Response
spirit:field.spirit:description: Response to be sent upstream

spirit:field.spirit:name: Count
spirit:field.spirit:description: A value written to field will be returned in the RdFrmHdr.Count field

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: A value written to field will be returned in the RdFrmHdr.Count field
This the frame header to be written to the cache

spirit:field.spirit:name: Enable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write 1 = Start transfer Read 1 = Busy Read 0 = Write/Read Complete

spirit:field.spirit:name: Mode
spirit:field.spirit:description: 0 = Write 1 = Read 2 = Copy 3 = Copy and Replace Action 4 = Copy and Replace Response 5 = Copy and Replace Modifier

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCH_MODE_WRITE
spirit:values.spirit:description: Write the packet in schfrmhdr to the queue DestQueue

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCH_MODE_READ
spirit:values.spirit:description: Read the packet in queue SrcQueue to rdfrmhdr

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCH_MODE_UPDATE
spirit:values.spirit:description: Write the packet in rdfrmhdr to the queue DestQueue

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCH_MODE_UPDATE_NEW_ACTION
spirit:values.spirit:description: Write the packet in rdfrmhdr and replace with the action field in schfrmhdr to the queue DestQueue

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCH_MODE_UPDATE_NEW_RESP
spirit:values.spirit:description: Write the packet in rdfrmhdr and replace with the response field in schfrmhdr to the queue DestQueue

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCH_MODE_UPDATE_NEW_MOD
spirit:values.spirit:description: Write the packet in rdfrmhdr and replace with the modifier field in schfrmhdr to the queue DestQueue

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCH_MODE_COPY
spirit:values.spirit:description: Read from the queue SrcQueue and write to the queue DestQueue

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This sets the transfer mode for the scheduler. When the mode is Write then the SchFrmHdr is written to the cache. When the mode is read then the RdFrmHdr is read from the cache. When the mode is set to Copy then the RdFrmHdr is written to the SchFrmHdr.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SchType
spirit:field.spirit:description: Describes how the xrex_tx_ctrl should handle the scheduling for this packet

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCHTYPE_MSA
spirit:values.spirit:description: Schedule as a Mass Storage packet

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCHTYPE_MSA_RETRY
spirit:values.spirit:description: Schedule as a Mass Storage retried packet

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCHTYPE_UPS
spirit:values.spirit:description: Schedule the packet so it is sent upstream

spirit:values.spirit:name: SCHTYPE_LOCAL
spirit:values.spirit:description: Schedule the packet so it is handled locally by the cpu. No responses are sent upstream

spirit:field.spirit:name: DestQueue
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the destination to be copied to

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This is the destination to be copied to

spirit:field.spirit:name: SrcQueue
spirit:field.spirit:description: This the source queue to be copied from

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This the source queue to be copied from

spirit:field.spirit:name: SrcQStat
spirit:field.spirit:description: This returns the queue status of the queue referenced in SrcQueue. 0 = not packet, 1 = not a full packet, 2 = 1 packet, 3 = more than one packet

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This returns the queue status of the queue referenced in SrcQueue. 0 = not packet, 1 = not a full packet, 2 = 1 packet, 3 = more than one packet

spirit:field.spirit:name: MsaNakLimit
spirit:field.spirit:description: This register specifies the maximum number of times the Xrex Tx Ctrl will retry a MSA packet when a Nak is received. It is specified in counts * 256. After the limit is reached then the nak response is return to the CpuDevResp queue

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This register specifies the maximum number of times the Xrex Tx Ctrl will retry a MSA packet when a Nak is received. It is specified in counts * 256. After the limit is reached then the nak response is return to the CpuDevResp queue

spirit:field.spirit:name: MinTime
spirit:field.spirit:description: This sets the minimum time for the SOF period in terms of system clocks for one USB frame

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This sets the minimum time for the SOF period in terms of system clocks for one USB frame

spirit:field.spirit:name: MaxTime
spirit:field.spirit:description: This sets the maximum time for the SOF period in terms of system clocks for one USB frame

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This sets the maximum time for the SOF period in terms of system clocks for one USB frame

spirit:field.spirit:name: RxFrameNum
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the last SOF frame number that was received downstream by Rex

spirit:field.spirit:name: TxFrameNum
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the last SOF frame number that was sent by Rex

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This is the last SOF frame number that was sent by Rex

spirit:field.spirit:name: TransferLen
spirit:field.spirit:description: This is the Transfer Length field from the CBW data packet

spirit:vendorExtensions.pdt:briefDescription: This is the Transfer Length field from the CBW data packet

spirit:field.spirit:name: RdAddr
spirit:field.spirit:description: Last sent address

spirit:field.spirit:name: RdEndp
spirit:field.spirit:description: Last sent endpoint

spirit:field.spirit:name: RdAction
spirit:field.spirit:description: Last sent action

spirit:field.spirit:name: RdDataQid
spirit:field.spirit:description: Last sent data qid

spirit:field.spirit:name: LastResp
spirit:field.spirit:description: Last response
